title: 'Not fit for house clean'
body: This quality and build is good... but its not for house clean... Since the corners are flat you can't use for house usage. Its good for hotels and party hall.

title: 'Gala sponge mop'
body: 'I dislike the handle for it makes the mop very heavy to use. The one I had earlier and is now worn out for which purpose I had to get this new one has an aluminium handle which is light. The old squeezer is tough plastic whereas the new one is metal all the more making the mop heavier. Gala company should be informed about the difference and preference.'

title: 'Gala spong mop'
body: I must say it's fabulous product,we dohave a labrador zoe and as u all dogs do shed a lot of hair which we were always unable to clean up with a regular house mop this one has worked wonders it's so handy,easy,and spotless cleaning I would really recommend this product

title: 'Wipper'
body: 'Very good product. Very easy to use. No need to use your hands. Again n again. Must buy product.'

title: 'Durable'
body: 'I bought four of them three and a half years ago. Should handle with care as the mechanism is a bit fragile. One has now broken as the sponge has torn. The other three are yet in perfect condition. But I repeat that the mechanism should be handled with care.'

title: 'Super practical'
body: 'Best moo Super absorbant Well thought product'

title: 'Bought in Jan 2023
body: '3.0 out of 5 stars'It is a great mop and easy to clean. The two joints to the squeezer handle isn't connected firmly, so after regular use of 5-6 months the base and the joints came out. Unable to use the mop now. Searching for something similar but sturdier. Manufacturers should see if those metal joints can be welded firmly so it serves longer, then it would be the best no-touch mop in the platform

title: 'Gala pva mop
body: '2.0 out of 5 stars'Product is poor and not upto the mark. Floor doesn't get fully cleaned.
